conbody.p: When specifying the NSA for a Centera unit, precede the network storage address with the string:
The high-level NSA syntax for a Centera unit is:centera://<connection_specification>[|<retention_specification>]

p.note: In the syntax above, the pipe symbol (|) is a character in the syntax; it is not the meta- syntax character that separates mutually exclusive options.

conbody.p: The network storage address for a Centera unit has two parts:

ul.li: <connection_specification>—includes parameters legal in Centera for FPPool_Open. For more information, see , next
<retention_specification>—specifies how long the data should be retained. For more information, see .
